posts.message: the city with the longest name ever! "Llanfairpwllgwyngyllgogerychwyrndrobwllllantysiliogogogoch"  is a large village and community on the island of Anglesey in Wales. a prize for the one that will pronounce it perfect :D
posts.caption: en.wikipedia.org

posts.caption: h-online.com
posts.description: Munich's City Council has criticised the HP study, commissioned by Microsoft, that claims to have identified high costs for Munich's Linux migration. There is no reason to adjust its own, significantly lower figures, said the Council
